thread.title: Shadow BYOD runs rampant in federal government
thread.title_full: Shadow BYOD runs rampant in federal government

title: Shadow BYOD runs rampant in federal government
text:
03 Shadow BYOD runs rampant in federal government 
CIO: As it turns out, many federal employees haven't been waiting for those policies to take effect before introducing their devices into the workplace.That's according to a new survey from Lookout, a mobile security firm, that identifies a rampant problem of "shadow BYOD" and warns CIOs that "you have a BYOD program whether you know it or not."
